name: TheLiahonaMagazine
0:
”Alexa open liahona magazine”
”Alexa, open liahona magazine and play the latest issue”
”Alexa, ask liahona magazine to play the October 2023 issue”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: liahona magazine
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Liahona Magazine is the official skill for accessing the Liahona magazine from The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints.

Listen to articles from the latest issues or ask for a specific issue. You can also ask for an article by name. The Liahona Magazine skill is a great way to bring the Spirit into your daily life, study about the teachings of Jesus Christ, and learn from other people's stories. 

You can send feedback to gospelvoice@ChurchofJesusChrist.org. 

 If you want to know more about The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints, please visit ChurchofJesusChrist.org.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
